description: Queries of this type are processed using Reconciliation Service.

defaultTerm.description: Provides a default query term for the case when keyword is not provided via arguments

entityType.description: Filter result by specified entityType. See documentation for Reconciliation API.

limit.description: Tells for how much results we are looking for

type.description: Type of the query. Should be always "lookup" in order to be of a type LookupDataQuery
